item.title: Writing a simple Redis Protocol parser in Elixir
item.description: Today, we are going to write a parser that parse Redis Protocol in Elixir. There are tons of supported commands in Redis. Since this is our first attempt on implementing it, we will only be focusing on the GET and SET. At the end of this post, you should be able to write a simple parser to parse request/response by Redis client/server.
